# Owl's Insight (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[5th Level Druid Spells|Druid 5]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 10th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 10]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Creature touched

**Duration:** 1 hour

**Saving Throw:** Fortitude negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 152

*As you cast this spell, your face is overlaid with the image of a snow owl. The image fades as you bestow your ally with comprehension.*

The subject gains an insight bonus to Wisdom equal to 1/2 your caster level.
